chinese: 老师给我布置了很多周末的家庭作业
english: my teacher gave me a lot of homework assignments for the weekend

chinese: 自愿帮助无家可归的人是一种非常人道的行为
english: volunteering to help the homeless is a very humane act

chinese: 学生在大学的最后一年有相当大的压力
english: students have considerable pressure in their final year of university

chinese: 我给你准备了几个苹果
english: I have several apples for you

chinese: 海里生活着为数众多的海洋生物
english: There're numerous forms of marine life in the sea

chinese: 科技革命改变了我们的通信方式
english: A revolution in science and technology has changed the way that we communicate

chinese: 您吃了吗？是中国人惯用的打招呼方式
english: Have you had your meal is a conventional greeting in China

chinese: 这个红色的气球爆炸了，吓到了这个孩子
english: The red ballon burst, and it scared the child

chinese: 女孩收到了男孩送的一些花
english: the girl received some flowers from the boy

chinese: 来自恶霸的骚扰很让人沮丧
english: Harassment from bullies can be very depressing

chinese: 这一家人都被传染了流感
english: the whole family has been infected with epidemic flu

chinese: 这个仪器能精确地测量出这个螺栓的直径
english: this device can precisely measure the diameter of the bolt

chinese: 两个商人为了各自在交易中的利益而争论了起来
english: two businessmen are disputing their rights in this deal

chinese: 双方达成协议后，，即可落实该项目
english: the implementation of the project will begin once they have agreed terms
